EmailTemplate.subject: Video: The nuts & bolts of store virtualization
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Unlock {{company.Company Name:default=your store}}'s true potential  with a software-defined approach <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/software-defined-store/unlock-potential]]> If you’re overseeing store technology for a retail brand, you know about virtualization. At least for data centers and the like. But what does it look like for a retail environment? And what does purpose-built store virtualization mean? Take a look in this brief video. <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/software-defined-store/unlock-potential]]> P.S. Data center virtualization isn’t designed for the challenging retail environment where space is limited and connectivity is often poor. But this is.
